I applied and I got it. And here I am. I find solar cell
research to be fascinating because there

are so many different possible solutions
to the problem. And as someone who's been

working in the field for over 15 years I
know my mind has been changed several

times on what the most promising
approach is. Ah, my lab works on several

different kinds of solar cells. We take a

everything from how they're made, to how

tried interact with industry to make sure
